Blacksmith of Wind Rooney:
What interesting research!
I tried various things with the fragments, and was able to make a totem containing the power of the dragons.
The effect differs, depending on how the fragments are combined. There is also a problem with range of output, so it can only be used where the power of the dragons can be felt. But still, the effect is... well... startling.
There are four types of totems.
